item.title: Simulating Transients and their Host Galaxies
item.description: Embedding realistic host-galaxy correlations into a simulated sample of transients for PLASTiCC v2.0.

item.title: Waternet: A Chemical Network for Cosmological-Scale Molecular Studies
item.description: How early in the universe did water form, and how common is it in high-redshift galaxies?

item.title: The Impact of Autonomous Vehicles on Washington State Traffic Flows
item.description: Would increasing the number of driverless cars in Washington State improve traffic flows?
